Exercise 1
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
mpg %>% tbl_df
my_plot <- ggplot(data = mpg, mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy))
my_plot + geom_point()
my_plot + geom_point(mapping = aes(colour = trans))
my_plot + geom_point(mapping = aes(colour = "red"))
my_plot + geom_point(mapping = aes(colour = "red")) + geom_smooth()
```
